Ensure the percentage text has font size 12px and color #333333
Click on the 'Reviews' tab
Verify the 'Reviews' tab becomes active, changing its background color to #ffffff and its border-bottom color to #007bff (2px solid)
Confirm the content panel associated with 'Reviews' is visible
Ensure the 'Description' tab becomes inactive, with background color #f0f0f0
Check the count of tabs is 3
Check each tab has padding 10px 15px
View the blog article
Verify the article title, 'Understanding UI Testing', has type size 32px, font weight 700, and color #222222
Ensure the first paragraph has text size 16px, font family 'Georgia', margin-bottom 20px, and text alignment left
Check the overall article width is 768px
Locate the social media icons in the footer
Verify there are 4 icons, horizontally aligned with margin-right 10px between them
Confirm the 'Facebook' icon has source 'facebook.svg' and is rendered at 24x24px
Ensure the icons have aria-label like 'Follow us on Facebook'
Check they change opacity to 0.7 on hover within 100ms transition
Open the date picker input
Verify the calendar grid becomes visible
Confirm selecting '25' for the current month sets the input field's value to '2023-10-25'
Ensure the selected date cell has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, circular shape (border-radius 50%), and width 30px
Load the user profile page

Verify the user avatar image, 'avatar.png', has natural dimensions 100x100px, rendered dimensions 40x40px, is loaded within 300ms, has border radius 50% for circular shape, alt text 'User profile picture', and top-left position x 20, y 20
Refresh the page
Verify the cookie consent banner is visible at bottom 0px, left 0px, right 0px, has height 80px, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, and opacity 0.9
Ensure the 'Accept' button has background color #007bff, border radius 4px, and padding 10px 20px
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes displayed adjacent to the icon within 100ms, displaying text 'Need assistance?', has background fill #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 5px 10px, text size 12px, and x position 10px relative to the icon's right edge
Navigate to the second page of search results
Verify the '2' pagination link is active with background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Confirm the '1' and '3' pagination links have background color #f0f0f0 and text color #333333
Ensure each pagination link has width 30px, height 30px, border radius 3px, and alignment center
